post.text: Anyone who sees and treats women this way is unfit to be president.

comment.author: Tyler
comment.text: Funny that Hillary NEVER mentions anything about her abusive and rapist hubby Bill. Ironic Hillary Clinton

replies.author: Desteny
replies.text: Is Bill running for president again? I mean its between her and Trump and not between family members... hope this is over soon. No political content.. only blaming each others... as the world has not problems enough

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Desteny well, if you're married to a rapist and abuser perhaps you should rather be quiet about some allegations you're saying about trump (especially if all 5 women came out on the exact same day... where are the police reports? Where are any records that trump has done anything... just quite weird)... so yeah, go ahead and support a criminal.

replies.author: Desteny
replies.text: you did not get my message. I say that both have some "issues" and I see campaigns about things which I never see in politics before (exept Italy). One does not pay taxes, abuses females...other sending e-mails and married to a strange former ex president...I do not support any of both but I am concerned that one of both has power to press a red button...! As I am not US I can not vote nor support...

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: The button issue is fabricated by the media. The media is continuously manipulating the nation with scare tactics. I doubt that either one of them is going to push the button as this would be detrimental. However, I believe that the US has to start dealing with certain threats slightly different as the approach we are using now clearly doesn't work...
